---
title: "Import data"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r setup}
library("opensignauxfaibles")
library("dplyr")
```

## Import table altares

```{bash}
in2csv data-raw/direccte/altares/RECAP_ALTARES.xls > data-raw/direccte/altares/RECAP_ALTARES.csv
```

```{r}
import_table_altares(
  path = "data-raw/direccte/altares/RECAP_ALTARES.csv"
  ) %>% 
  glimpse()
```

## Activité partielle

```{r}
import_table_apart(

  ) %>% 
  glimpse()
```

## Cotisations URSSAF

```{r}
import_table_cotisation_csv(
```
